events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and I am quite disappointed with the purchase.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund inquiry due to sizing and fitting issues with the purchased jacket.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your jacket. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
The order number is 1234567890. The jacket is brand new and hasn't been worn or damaged at all.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund once you return the jacket using the prepaid return label we will send you shortly.
Thank you, that sounds great. I appreciate the quick help and will send back the jacket as soon as possible.
The return label has been emailed to you. Once the jacket is received, the refund will be processed promptly.
We are contacting you to verify if you have returned the jacket and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
I have mailed the jacket back yesterday, and I'm looking forward to receiving the refund soon. Thanks for the support.
The refund was successfully processed and the case is now closed. Please feel free to reach out if you need anything else.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on your refund experience with our support team.
